name: IÂ love noise
description: A bold, modern badge featuring the text 'I Love Noise.' The design combines clean, minimal fonts for 'I' and 'Love' with a grungy, distorted style for 'Noise,' symbolizing sound and chaos. The background is vibrant, with abstract sound waves, giving it an edgy, underground aesthetic. The badge is round and glossy, resembling a wearable pin.
